      • requestInfo

        public static java.lang.Object requestInfo(decoworld.protocol.management.DataRequest request)
                                    throws DataRequestFailureException
        Request information from the server. This function will block for 2second at maximum approximately
        Parameters:
        request - DataRequest.getObj() should hold the information needed to complete the request type given by DataRequest.getType(). DataRequest.getId() should be unique.
        Returns:
        An object of the expected type corresponding to the case.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessError
        DataRequestFailureException

      • receivedObject

        public static void receivedObject(decoworld.protocol.management.DataRequest data)
        Upon receiving a DataRequest, checks if it's a response, else throws it away. Loads the Received data back into the function that called for the data (assuming it's still waiting).
        Parameters:
        data - An object holding the expected information.
